text: The women's 4 x 100 metres relay event at the 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Amsterdam, Netherlands, at Olympisch Stadion on 15 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Susan Burnside Helen Roscoe Sabrina Scott Abiodun Oyepitan ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Yuliya Bartsevich Oksana Dragun Yelena Nevmerzhitskaya Yevgeniya Likhuta ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Elina Lax Heidi Hannula Johanna Manninen Katja Salivaara ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 15 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Nation !! Competitors !! Time !! title: 2001 European Athletics U23 Championships – Women's 4 × 100 metres relay
